4247.quoteText: • offer you targeted advertising in order to personalize your experience by showing you advertisements that are more relevant to you. and/or
4247.title: personal data is used for advertising

tosdr.case: The service uses your personal data for advertising
tosdr.tldr: personal data is used for advertising

12013.quoteText: We and service providers acting on our behalf store log files and use tracking technologies such as cookies, web beacons, tracking pixels, and local shared objects, also known as flash cookies, to collect information relating to you and your use of the Service.
12013.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

12014.quoteText: Agreement to arbitrate, class action waiver
12014.title: You waive your right to a class action.

tosdr.case: You waive your right to a class action.

12016.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms

12017.quoteText:
ResearchGate does not process any credit card information itself, however we do retain your name and address so we may generate and send you an invoice.
Credit card information is collected and processed by a third-party provider, namely Stripe.
12017.title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

12019.quoteText: including but not limited to unwanted romantic advances, junk mail, offers to buy or sell, spam, chain letters, phishing schemes, and deceptive or excessive messages
12019.title: This service prohibits users sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

tosdr.case: This service prohibits users sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

12020.quoteText:
Members, we generally store their personal data as long as their account is active.If you have created an account, you can close it yourself in your ‘Account Settings’.
If you request that we close your account for you, we might ask for proof of identity before doing so.
12020.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time
